channel.title: 4th" on Robotics - Math - Computer Coding - Chess in Charlottesville
channel.description: Recent content in 4th" on Robotics - Math - Computer Coding - Chess in Charlottesville

item.title: 1-Day Camp; Apr 18, 2025 | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: Join us for an exhilarating exploration of robotics, coding, chess, and math. Teamwork and collaboration are at the heart of our camp experience. Students will have the opportunity to work together, share ideas, and solve challenges. Through hands-on activities and group projects, students will develop critical thinking skills and learn the importance of effective communication.

item.title: Python for Kids | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: Through interactive challenges, students help twin baby monkeys reunite by solving coding problems, reinforcing their understanding of Python fundamentals and advanced topics. The course covers essential concepts such as sequencing, loops, conditionals, and functions. Course Content Sequencing: Understanding the order of instructions is crucial for programming logic. Lists & Indexing: Learning to store and access multiple items efficiently. For loops: Iterating over sequences to automate repetitive tasks. Variables: Storing data that can be used and modified throughout the program.

item.title: Robotics with Vex IQ | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: Description: Join us at Blue Ridge Boost for an exciting, hands-on journey into coding and computational thinking with the VEX IQ (2nd Generation) robotics platform! Using the structured curriculum from the Carnegie Mellon Robotics Academy, this class introduces students to the fundamentals of robotics programming, problem-solving, and real-world applications. Designed for beginners and enthusiasts, the course features engaging, project-based activities that teach students to build, program, and control their robots using the VEXcode programming software.

item.title: Vex Go Challenges | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: The VEX GO Competition is an exciting, team-based robotics challenge designed specifically for elementary students to explore STEM concepts in a fun and engaging way. Using the VEX GO building system, teams will design, build, and program their robots to complete a series of creative and hands-on missions. Participants will: Develop critical thinking and teamwork skills by solving real-world challenges. Learn the basics of engineering, robotics, and coding through guided activities.

item.title: Code Quest | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: Banana Code Quest is a gamified coding course designed to teach young students real-world coding from the first challenge. Through engaging puzzles and adventures, students help a monkey catch bananas and outsmart various animals while learning fundamental and advanced coding concepts in a fun and interactive way. Key Features Real Coding Language: Students will code using CoffeeScript, a language similar to JavaScript but with a friendlier syntax, making it perfect for kids.

item.title: Girl Powered Fridays on 2025-01-24 | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: Designed to empower girls in Science, Technology, Engineering, and Mathematics (STEM)! We welcome girls and their supporters to an evening of innovation and discovery. Fuel your creativity with complimentary pizza and dessert. Together, let's break barriers and build a future where girls thrive in STEM fields!

item.title: Girl Powered Fridays on 2025-03-07 | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: Designed to empower girls in Science, Technology, Engineering, and Mathematics (STEM)! We welcome girls and their supporters to an evening of innovation and discovery. Fuel your creativity with complimentary pizza and dessert. Together, let's break barriers and build a future where girls thrive in STEM fields!

item.title: Girl Powered Fridays on 2025-05-02 | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: Designed to empower girls in Science, Technology, Engineering, and Mathematics (STEM)! We welcome girls and their supporters to an evening of innovation and discovery. Fuel your creativity with complimentary pizza and dessert. Together, let's break barriers and build a future where girls thrive in STEM fields!

item.title: Math Boost | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: This class is tailored for students who are in the top half of the class, but need clarifications of some grade-level concepts. It offers reinforcement of key concepts through extra practice with typical grade-level problems, ensuring that students can grasp and master the material at their own pace. Additionally, students will have the opportunity to work on materials recommended by their classroom teacher and tackle problems suggested by Blue Ridge Boost instructors, providing a tailored and comprehensive approach to meet their individual learning needs.

item.title: Math Excellence | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: In our advanced math class, we harness the engaging and comprehensive materials from Beast Academy to cultivate a deep understanding and passion for mathematics. Each student embarks on a personalized mathematical journey under the guidance of an expert Blue Ridge Boost instructor. Class Structure Introduction: Each session begins with a concise lesson introducing new concepts and exercise types. Guided Practice: Students then apply these concepts through hands-on problem-solving, with instructor support readily available.

item.title: Math Mastery | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: This advanced mathematics class is designed for curious students ranking in the top of their class who are eager to explore math beyond the typical school curriculum. Utilizing the renowned Dimensions Singapore Math curriculum, our year-long program emphasizes deep conceptual understanding, critical thinking, problem-solving strategies, and practical application of mathematical principles. Key Features: Advanced Mental Math Strategies: Students will be introduced to various mental math techniques to improve their calculation skills.

item.title: Parents Night Out on 2025-01-31 | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: Roblox and STEM Adventure Night! Give your young geniuses an evening of fun and learning! Drop off your kids (ages 6 to 10) for an exciting adventure in: Roblox: Explore problem-solving, creativity, and collaboration through the world of Roblox! Build, play, and learn in a fun, interactive environment. Gaming: Engage in exciting games that encourage teamwork and strategic thinking. Robotics: Unleash their creativity with hands-on tech activities. Coding: Develop logical thinking and innovation with beginner-friendly programming challenges.

item.title: Parents Night Out on 2025-02-28 | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: Give your young geniuses an evening of fun and learning! Drop off your kids (ages 6 to 10) for an exciting adventure in: Chess: Sharpen their critical thinking skills through strategic challenges. Gaming: Explore problem-solving and collaboration through play. Robotics: Unleash their creativity with hands-on tech using VEX Robotics, where innovation meets fun! Coding: Dive into logical thinking and innovation with beginner-friendly programming activities.

item.description: Give your young geniuses an evening of fun and learning! item.title: Parents Night Out on 2025-04-13 | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: Give your young geniuses an evening of fun and learning! Drop off your kids (ages 6 to 10) for an exciting adventure in: LEGO Robotics: Unleash their creativity by building and programming LEGO robots! Hands-on fun with endless possibilities. Gaming: Engage in exciting games that encourage teamwork and strategic thinking. Robotics: Explore problem-solving and innovation through fun tech activities. Coding: Develop logical thinking and innovation with beginner-friendly programming challenges.

item.description: Roblox and STEM Adventure Night! Robotics: Unleash their creativity with hands-on tech activities. Coding: Develop logical thinking and innovation with beginner-friendly programming challenges.

item.title: Robotics with Lego Spike | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: Jump into the world of robotics and coding with the LEGO Education SPIKE Prime system! This hands-on course introduces students to the exciting possibilities of robotics engineering and computational thinking through engaging, project-based learning. Designed for beginners to intermediate learners, this course will teach students how to design, build, and program robotic solutions to solve real-world challenges. In this course, students will: Learn the basics of robotics using the LEGO SPIKE Prime kit.

item.title: Scratch Coding | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: Come and learn to code your own games in Scratch! Each session will create a new game.

item.title: Spring Break Camp | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: Python coding in the morning and Lego Robotics in the afternoon.
